Interface AbstractFactoryIF

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFactoryEconomy
public interface AbstractFactoryIF

Interface to create accounts and security managers. The structure follows the Abstract Factory pattern. Account and security manager are created by implementations.

See Also:
package account.

Method Summary
 pattpack.account.AccountIF createAccount(int loginId)
          Create an account.
